short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert embedded video screen to text using Tesseract OCR to improve video accessibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts the current embedded video screen to text using Tesseract OCR with only a keypress (0). It aims to improve video accessibility for screen reader users.
